snippet.title: Half Away Trailer
snippet.description:
Half Away Trailer

Half Away is a narrative-driven puzzle-adventure game set in a mystical world inspired by Slavic and Japanese folklore.

Juna wakes up in a mysterious forest with no memory of how she got there. She remembers only that she was once sick in bed, battling a high fever. Now, she’s in the Limbo—a land reserved for spirits and rarely seen by humans. Here, she realizes her soul is caught between life and death, and her only hope is to find a way back… or to stay and lend her powers to both spirits and the living.

Guided by the ancient runes of shamans and powers bestowed by the land’s inhabitants, Juna must solve puzzles and uncover secrets hidden in this fractured realm. Limbo is composed of many small lands and micro-dimensions, each housing unique spirits and mysteries. Will she explore this enchanted world and become a part of it, or will she simply pass through before returning to the Land of the Living?

It’s all up to Juna—and up to you. Wishlist Half Away on Steam now to join Juna on her unforgettable journey through Limbo!

- Half Away on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3323500/Half_Away/
- Half Away on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3323500/Half_Away/
- Half Away on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3323500/Half_Away/
